be.ac.ulb.infof307.g03.models

Class GeometryDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g03.models.GeometryDAO

  • public class GeometryDAO
extends java.util.Observable
    Author:
    Titouan Christophe The geometry class is a DAO for all geometry related models. Handle CRUD operations, and the associations logic
